revised_title: Short-Range Repulsive Forces Between Polyatomic Molecules
tldr: The article explores the short-range repulsive forces between closed-shell polyatomic molecules and how they arise from a reduction in combined electron density in the region of overlap. The authors use the Hellman-Feynman theorem to analyze the forces and find that they are locally additive for certain types of molecules, while others exhibit non-additive behavior.
